# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono auto generated files
mono_crash.*

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# macOS files
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Logs
*.log

# Visual Studio Code files
.vscode/

# Rider files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Visual Studio workspace and config
.vs/

# NPM packages
node_modules/

# Dependencies
*.dll
*.pdb
*.cache
*.so
*.dylib
*.class

# DotNet artifacts
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# Uncomment if using ASP.NET
# wwwroot/

# Azure Functions artifacts
local.settings.json

# Docker
docker-compose.override.yml
.dockerignore
